content.raw_text: From: support@discoveryplus.com To: rahul.kumar@inboxmail.com Date: April 14, 2023, 9:42 AM IST Subject: Your Discovery+ subscription renews soon — April 21, Hi Rahul, Thank you for being a valued Discovery+ subscriber! We wanted to let you know that your Monthly Plan (₹99) is set to renew on Friday, April 21, 2023. When your subscription renews, ₹99 will be charged to your saved payment method ending in 5483. Your subscription gives you continued access to: Top shows from Discovery, TLC, Animal Planet & more New originals, documentaries, and regional content in 8+ Indian languages Offline downloads for on-the-go viewing If you'd like to review or make changes to your subscription, you can do so anytime: Manage My Subscription Need help or have questions? Just reply to this email or visit our Help Center — we’re always here for you. Thank you for choosing Discovery+. We love having you with us. Warm regards, Priya Singh Customer Support Executive support@discoveryplus.com www.discoveryplus.com

From: support@discoveryplus.com To: emily.martin@outlook.com Date: April 21, 2023, 7:02 AM GMT Subject: Your Discovery+ payment was successful Reply-To: support@discoveryplus.com Hi Emily, Thanks for your payment! We’re happy to let you know that your Discovery+ Ad-Free Monthly Plan has been successfully renewed on April 21, 2023. A charge of $6.99 has been applied to your card ending in 5821. Your subscription details: • Plan: Ad-Free Monthly • Amount Charged: $6.99 • Payment Method: Visa ending in 5821 • Next Billing Date: May 21, 2023 With your subscription, you’ll continue to enjoy: Unlimited streaming without ads Access to exclusive Discovery+ Originals Popular content from HGTV, TLC, Animal Planet, ID, and more Offline downloads to watch anywhere, anytime Need to make changes or update your payment method? You can do that anytime: Manage My Subscription If you have any questions, feel free to reply to this email or visit our Help Center. Thanks again for choosing Discovery+. We’re glad to have you with us. Warm regards, Sarah Coleman Customer Experience Team Discovery+ support@discoveryplus.com www.discoveryplus.com

From: welcome@discoveryplus.com To: daniel.smith@gmail.com Date: July 12, 2023, 5:46 PM GMT Subject: Welcome to Discovery+ — Let’s get started Reply-To: support@discoveryplus.com Hi Daniel, Welcome to Discovery+ — we’re excited you’re here! Your account is now active, and you can start exploring the best real‑life entertainment. From gripping true crime to lifestyle, nature, food, and science — there’s something amazing waiting for you. What’s next? Browse free episodes and featured content Discover what’s trending on Discovery, TLC, HGTV, Animal Planet & more Upgrade anytime for full access and an ad-free experience Start Browsing See Plans & Pricing Need help setting up your account or devices? Contact customer support Enjoy the journey, The Discovery+ Team

From: welcome@discoveryplus.com To: emma.jones@outlook.com Date: February 11, 2023, 8:12 AM GMT Subject: Welcome to Discovery+ — Your subscription is now active Reply-To: support@discoveryplus.com Hi Emma, Welcome to Discovery+ — we’re thrilled you’re here! 🎉 Your subscription is live and ready to roll. Your plan details: • Plan: Ad-Free Monthly • Start Date: February 11, 2023 • Next Billing Date: March 11, 2023 • Amount: $8.99/month Here’s what you can do right now: Watch shows from Discovery, TLC, Animal Planet, HGTV, ID & more Stream on all your devices: mobile, web, tablet, or smart TV Download episodes for offline viewing (Ad‑Free only) Enjoy multiple language options (where available) Start Streaming Now Set Up Your Devices Need help? Visit our Help Center Thanks for joining Discovery+. Happy streaming! The Discovery+ Team

Subject: Payment issue – action needed to keep streaming From: support@discoveryplus.com To: charlotte.brown@gmail.com Date: january 5, 2023, 4:18 PM GMT Reply‑To: support@discoveryplus.com Hi Charlotte, We were unable to process your latest Discovery+ payment for the Ad-Free Monthly Plan 99$ on May 5, 2023. The issue might be due to an expired card, insufficient funds, or a temporary bank error. To keep your streaming uninterrupted: Log in and update your payment method You have 7 days before your subscription is paused We'll attempt another charge once your info is updated If you need any help or have questions, feel free to reply or visit our Help Center. Thanks for being with us, The Discovery+ Team

Subject: Refund processed for your Discovery+ subscription From: support@discoveryplus.com To: charlotte.brown@gmail.com Date: May 10, 2023, 2:05 PM GMT Reply‑To: support@discoveryplus.com Hi Charlotte, We’ve processed your refund of ₹99 for the Ad-Free Monthly Plan. The amount has been credited back to your card ending in 5824. You should see it reflected in your account within 5–7 business days, depending on your bank. As your refund has been issued, your subscription has ended and access to content will stop immediately. We’re sorry to see you go, but hope to welcome you back soon. Visit Your Account to view subscription details Need help? Visit our Help Center or reply to this email Thanks for spending time with us, The Discovery+ Team
